results.name: wordpress-example/mysql-6cf68db797-4t48s

error.Text: the last termination reason is Error container=mysql pod=mysql-6cf68db797-4t48s

results.details:
Error: The MySQL container in the pod "mysql-6cf68db797-4t48s" terminated with an error.

Solution: 
1. Check pod logs: `kubectl logs mysql-6cf68db797-4t48s -c mysql`.
2. Inspect events: `kubectl describe pod mysql-6cf68db797-4t48s`.
3. Verify MySQL config and credentials.
4. Restart pod: `kubectl delete pod mysql-6cf68db797-4t48s`.

results.name: wordpress-example/wordpress-84c88bf4c6-t5vq7

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: Get "http://10.244.2.2:80/wp-admin/install.php": context deadline exceeded (Client.Timeout exceeded while awaiting headers)

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because the request to the specified URL timed out.

Solution: 
1. Check network connectivity to the pod.
2. Increase the timeout setting for the readiness probe.
3. Ensure the application is running and accessible at the specified URL.

results.name: wordpress-example/mysql

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/mysql-6cf68db797-4t48s], expected 1

results.details:
Error: The service has no ready endpoints because the specified pod is not ready.

Solution: 
1. Check pod status with `kubectl get pods`.
2. Inspect pod logs using `kubectl logs mysql-6cf68db797-4t48s`.
3. Ensure readiness probe is correctly configured.
4. Restart pod if necessary.
